about.title: About Me
data: I am a Software Engineer specialized in backend and full stack development, with experience in demanding enterprise environments and expertise in key technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, SQL, Node.js, and Angular.

During my time at NTT DATA, I contributed to the development of solutions for Enagás, participating in the design, analysis, and optimization of complex enterprise systems. This experience has allowed me to develop a comprehensive understanding of the entire software development lifecycle—from planning and development to testing and continuous integration.

What sets me apart is my ability to combine a strong technical foundation with an analytical mindset, persistence, and a results-driven approach. I don’t just develop software: I identify problems, propose improvements, and build scalable, maintainable solutions aligned with business goals.
